players.name: Alice
memory: The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Diana: "I investigated Alice last night and found them mafia. Alice, you know I'm the detective, so stop lying. Vote for Alice."
Diana: "I confirm Alice is mafia. As the only detective, I have evidence. Vote Alice to stop the killer."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
